001package com.pusher.rest.marshaller;
002
003import com.google.gson.Gson;
004
005public class DefaultDataMarshaller implements DataMarshaller {
006
007   private final Gson gson;
008
009   public DefaultDataMarshaller() {
010      gson = new Gson();
011   }
012
013   public DefaultDataMarshaller(Gson customGsonInstance) {
014      gson = customGsonInstance;
015   }
016
017   public String marshal(final Object data) {
018      return gson.toJson(data);
019   }
020}
